titles.title: Remote Monitoring Access Act of 2007
A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for coverage of remote patient management services for chronic health care conditions under the Medicare Program.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S2000-2002, S2079)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
2/15/2007--Introduced.
Remote Monitoring Access Act of 2007 - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to provide for coverage of remote patient management services for chronic health care conditions.
